LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityUpMajor.label: arcane hypersensitizer
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityUpMajor.description: This weapon amplifies the wielder's magical aptitude by 40%. This only applies while the weapon is held.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityUpMinor.label: arcane sensitizer
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityUpMinor.description: This weapon amplifies the wielder's magical aptitude by 20%. This only applies while the weapon is held.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityDownMinor.label: arcane dampener
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityDownMinor.description: This weapon suppresses the wielder's magical aptitude by 15%. This only applies while the weapon is held.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityDownMajor.label: arcane fog
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityDownMajor.description: This weapon suppresses the wielder's magical aptitude by 30%. This only applies while the weapon is held.
LanguageData.OnKill_PsyfocusGain.description: This weapon's persona focuses on deaths. If the weapon kills someone, the wielder will instantly gain 20% mana.
LanguageData.PsyfocusMeditationBonus.label: arcane-meditative
LanguageData.PsyfocusMeditationBonus.description: This weapon's persona is naturally meditative and helps its wielder focus in psychic meditation. The wielder gains an extra 10% mana per day of meditation, as long as the weapon is held.
LanguageData.NoPain.description: This weapon's persona is expert at channeling and absorbing the pain of it's weilder via it's extensive mana pathways. The one holding the weapon will feel no pain of any kind.
LanguageData.SpeedBoost.label: arcane speed
LanguageData.HungerMaker.label: arcane hunger
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.label: arcane load sink
LanguageData.NeuralHeatRecoveryGain.description: This weapon's persona has the ability to help dissipate the wielder's arcane load. The wielder's arcane load dissipation is improved by 0.15 per second.
